gp-desc: A ghost ping happens when a user @mentions someone and deletes the message, but the ping still remains. Usually it's really annoying.
lvl-notify: Notify users when reaching a new level
moderation-desc: You can ban or kick members that keep breaking the rules!
gp-desc2: If someone pings you and deletes the message, the ping will still remain. Usually it's pretty annoying, so Mipper will notify you!
ai-desc: With Mipper, you can talk to AI right in Discord!
add-mipper: Add Mipper to your Discord server right now!
privacy-content1: Your privacy is very important to us. It is our responsibility to ensure the security and confidentiality of your personal data while providing services based on it.
privacy-content2: Mipper collects the information about the user who ran the command (user's tag, user ID and avatar), the server in which the command was run (server name, server ID and server avatar) and counts the command for the "Commands Ran" counter on the website. The counter itself is anonymous.
privacy-content3: The collected information is used to enhance bot functionality and deliver personalized user experiences. It is not shared publicly or with any third parties to maintain user privacy and confidentiality.
privacy-content4: Users have the right to request the removal of their data. Data removal requests can be submitted by sending a ticket in our Discord server or via email. Upon receiving a valid request, we will promptly process the removal of the requested data in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.
privacy-effective: This policy is effective as of April 10, 2024.
terms-content1: By using the bot and accessing the website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, as well as by Discord's Terms of Service and Yandex's Terms of Service. You also agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are restricted from using or accessing this site and the bot.
terms-content2: The materials on Mipper's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Mipper makes no warranties and hereby disclaims all other warranties. Mipper and its representatives are not liable for any damage to your Discord server due to misconfiguration or negligence by server administrators. Mipper's configuration is provided "as is," and its use is allowed at the user's own risk. Furthermore, Mipper and its representatives are not liable for any actions taken with the /say command or the AI module provided by Yandex.
terms-content3: Mipper may change these terms of service at any time without notice. Continued use of the bot and website after modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
terms-content4: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of Russia, and you submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
terms-effective: These terms are effective as of July 4, 2024.
bak-err: It is not a valid backup file!
var-lvl-member: the member who got a new level
var-welcome-member: the member who joined the server
wl-enable: Notify when members leave the server
var-wl-member: the member who left the server
